name: Monster Escape Legends. Zombie Dash In City Craft
name_original: Monster Escape Legends. Zombie Dash In City Craft
description:
◉ Monster Escape Legends Dash ◉

Escape from the monsters or fight the battle and kill them in this funny christmas arcade game! Become a warrior, a wizard or an archer and be the best hunter!

If you love monster games and christmas legends, this is the game you've been waiting for! Become a hunter and fight the battle! There is even an evil santa running free!

Are you ready to be the hero of this awesome monster game? Become a hunter legend?

As you go further and kill monsters you will win cash and you'll be able to buy better characters! A warrior gladiator or samurai, a wizard or a witch, maybe a fast archer…

You can past close to monsters and you will win more points and more cash! So kill some and do a close shave on others. Be the super-fast dash legend! The best hunter! And look for Santa!


◉ KEY FEATURES of Monster Escape Legends Dash ◉

- Monsters like Evil Santa, Evil Pumpkin queen! Skeletons, Mummies and a lot more!
- Heroes like a naked man, a samurai, a shaman, a witch, a princess, a fast archer and many more!
- Addictive gameplay!
- Christmas legends like Evil Santa!
- Very simple controls!
- Incredible graphics!
- Leaderboards and achievements!
- Entertaining Music!
- Free!

◉ GAMEPLAY ◉

- Tilt or Touch to move
- Touch the arrows to go faster or slower
- Touch the sword to attack and kill some monsters!

◉ TIPS ◉

- The faster you go the more points you get
- If you kill monsters continuously you can do combos and get more points and cash
- If you run close to the monsters you will do a close shave and get more points and cash. You can do close shave combos too!


Have endless fun by downloading Monster Escape Legends Dash!

Do not forget to give us a review!
